primarySegments.name: Busy Professionals
primarySegments.description: Dog owners with demanding work schedules who need reliable dog walking services.

problemsNeeds: Lack of time to walk their dogs
Need for trustworthy and flexible service
Desire for real-time updates on their pet
behaviors: Use the app frequently on weekdays
Engage with app notifications and updates

primarySegments.name: Elderly Dog Owners
primarySegments.description: Older adults who may have physical limitations that prevent them from walking their dogs regularly.

problemsNeeds: Need for assistance with pet care
behaviors: Use the app with assistance or simplified features
Rely on customer support for assistance

primarySegments.name: Young Urban Dwellers
primarySegments.description: Young adults living in urban areas who own dogs and have active lifestyles.

problemsNeeds: Limited space for dogs to exercise
Need for last-minute or on-demand services
Desire for community and social interactions
behaviors: Use the app for spontaneous bookings
Engage with social features and community events
